message.body: I just got your gift! I absolutely love it. Thank you sweetheart. I love you and miss you Shannon
I'm glad it got there in time! Take a picture when you end up wearing it for me. :) I love you! And you don't have to sign your name in texts....
I know that! I set it up for when I have to email my students. I'll figure it out:) Love you Shannon
Oh well don't worry about it...
